In CO, 3/4 of these rent burdened households earn less than $18,400 annually. Nearly 30% are families with children.
Households at risk for homelessness are spending more than 50% of their income on housing costs.
More than 35% of CO households are renters. Nearly 50% are rent burdened, meaning they pay more than 30% of their monthly income on rent.
